Package uk.ac.aber.cs221.gp01.main.java.ui.controllers

Controllers - This package contains all of the FXML controller files.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rhys Evans (rhe24), Nathan Williams (naw21), Alex Thumwood (alt38)
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGame
    GameView - An interface that controls the Game scene that is defined in Game.fxml Used with Game.fxml This controller controller the game view it contains the timer update methods, score update methods and runs the front end logic changing the colours of the grid with the help of GridDisplayer
    INeedPrep
    Interface that prepares overlays for display
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseOverlay
    The Parent Class of any overlay controller
    BaseScreen
    The Parent Class of any screen controller
    End
    End - A class that controls the Pause subscene that is defined in End.fxml Used with End.fxml
    GameView
    GameView - A class that controls the Game scene that is defined in Game.fxml Used with Game.fxml This controller controller the game view it contains the timer update methods, score update methods and runs the front end logic changing the colours of the grid with the help of GridDisplayer
    GridDisplayer
    A class to help GameView display the grids.
    Help
    Controller for the Help.fxml file to handle the displaying of various help screens
    HighScore
    HighScore - A class that controls the IScore scene that is defined in IScore.fxml Load and display highscores from another class Used with IScore.fxml
    LoadGrid
    LoadGrid - A class that controls the LoadGrid scene that is defined in Load.fxml Used with Load.fxm
    SettingsOverlay
    SettingsOverlay - A class that does something.
    Start
    Start - A class that does something.
